Title: Regulations for staff and workers - Four: Exert oneself in study; raise the level of politics, culture, science and technology, and professional work
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Studying presented as as an activity all by itself, leading to professionalization. One of the books on the table in the foreground is about microwave theory, another about electronics and computers.
Theme: To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
